meanings.definition: A receptacle or cavity in which something is contained or enclosed.
meanings.sent1: The conceptacle held all the colorful marbles safely inside.
meanings.sent2: She placed the jewelry in the conceptacle on her dresser.
meanings.sent3: The conceptacle decided to play hide-and-seek with the toys inside.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a conceptacle overflowing with creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The conceptacle was like a treasure chest, full of secrets waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: A structure in certain algae that contains reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The conceptacle of the algae released tiny spores into the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the conceptacle of the seaweed to understand its reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The conceptacle of the algae threw a party for the reproductive organs.
meanings.sent4: The conceptacle of the algae was a bustling city of life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the conceptacle of the algae looked like a tiny world of its own.

meanings.definition: A small, specialized structure in certain fungi for producing spores.
meanings.sent1: The conceptacle of the fungus released spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: The researchers examined the conceptacle of the mushroom under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The conceptacle of the fungi decided to throw a spore party.
meanings.sent4: In the dark forest, the conceptacle of the fungi glowed softly.
meanings.sent5: The conceptacle of the fungi was like a factory producing tiny seeds of life.
